title: Sarah McBride To Be First Transgender Person In US Congress
content: Delaware state senator Sarah McBride won a seat in the US House of Representatives, making her the first openly transgender politician elected to Congress.
summary: Delaware state senator Sarah McBride won a seat in the US House of Representatives, making her the first openly transgender politician elected to Congress.

title: Hurricane Rafael Barrels Through Cayman Islands
content: Hurricane Rafael is passing through the Cayman Islands in the Caribbean and is forecast to rapidly intensify before making landfall in western Cuba.
summary: Hurricane Rafael is passing through the Cayman Islands in the Caribbean and is forecast to rapidly intensify before making landfall in western Cuba.

title: New York Times's "Needle" Points To Trump Win With Projection Of 285 Electoral Votes
content: The famous election prognosticator, New York Times's "Needle", was projecting an 84 per cent chance of a Donald Trump victory with about 295 electoral college votes based on its data at 10:30 p.m. Tuesday (9 a.m. Wednesday in India).
summary: The famous election prognosticator, New York Times's "Needle", was projecting an 84 per cent chance of a Donald Trump victory with about 295 electoral college votes based on its data at 10:30 p.m. Tuesday (9 a.m. Wednesday in India).

title: Snow Seen On Mount Fuji After Record Time Without
content: Snow has finally fallen on Mount Fuji, photographs shared by local authorities and residents showed, after the Japanese mountain's longest-ever stint with bare slopes.
summary: Snow has finally fallen on Mount Fuji, photographs shared by local authorities and residents showed, after the Japanese mountain's longest-ever stint with bare slopes.

title: Elon Musk Says "Game, Set And Match" As Donald Trump Takes Big Lead
content: The expression that Elon Musk used on X is commonly used at the conclusion of a tennis match to indicate that a competitor has won.
summary: The expression that Elon Musk used on X is commonly used at the conclusion of a tennis match to indicate that a competitor has won.

title: Beyonce's Shout Out To Kamala Harris With Her Picture On Her T-Shirt
content: Compared to her rival Donald Trump, Kamala Harris has a much bigger list of celebrity endorsements.

title: US Elections 2024: How Swing States Have Shaped Past Poll Outcomes
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are locked in a tight race for the White House. While millions of Americans have cast their ballot, many are still at polling stations exercising their franchise.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are locked in a tight race for the White House. While millions of Americans have cast their ballot, many are still at polling stations exercising their franchise.

title: Pennsylvania, Key Swing State In US Election, Swings To Advantage Trump
content: Republican candidate Donald Trump has surged ahead of Democrat challenger Kamala Harris in the key battleground state of Pennsylvania as the votes cast in the US election are counted.
summary: Republican candidate Donald Trump has surged ahead of Democrat challenger Kamala Harris in the key battleground state of Pennsylvania as the votes cast in the US election are counted.

title: 'Evil, Sick, Trash': Donald Trump's Campaign A Trail Of Misogyny
content: Mr Trump and his supporters have not shied away from crude or even sexist remarks against women in speeches, also often supporting such remarks from spectators at their rallies.
summary: Mr Trump and his supporters have not shied away from crude or even sexist remarks against women in speeches, also often supporting such remarks from spectators at their rallies.

title: US Elections: How Jill Stein Could Swing Poll Outcome In Trump's Favour
content: Hours before the US Presidential Elections, the Democrats warned voters that supporting Jill Stein, the US Green Party nominee, could inadvertently hand the presidency to Donald Trump.
summary: Hours before the US Presidential Elections, the Democrats warned voters that supporting Jill Stein, the US Green Party nominee, could inadvertently hand the presidency to Donald Trump.

title: Opinion: Harris vs Trump: The Unbearable Absurdity Of US Presidential Polls
content: The US presidential election was once a lesson in how democracy asserts itself. In 2024, it has become something else: a glorified version of Hulk Hogan wrestling with his shirt.
summary: The US presidential election was once a lesson in how democracy asserts itself. In 2024, it has become something else: a glorified version of Hulk Hogan wrestling with his shirt.

title: Swing States Swing To Advantage Trump, Harris Trails In 6 Out Of 7
content: Two hours into the US election counting, Republican candidate Donald Trump and his Democrat opponent Kamala Harris are leading in three and two swing states, respectively.
summary: Two hours into the US election counting, Republican candidate Donald Trump and his Democrat opponent Kamala Harris are leading in three and two swing states, respectively.

title: What's Fluoride And Why Trump Would Remove It From Drinking Water If He Wins
content: Fluoride, a naturally occurring mineral, is commonly added to public drinking water to prevent tooth decay, a practice endorsed by numerous health authorities.
summary: Fluoride, a naturally occurring mineral, is commonly added to public drinking water to prevent tooth decay, a practice endorsed by numerous health authorities.

title: Mars May Have Been Habitable Much Recently Than Previously Thought: Study
content: The study published in Nature Communications makes for the most compelling case to date about Mars' supposed 'life-rich' history.
summary: The study published in Nature Communications makes for the most compelling case to date about Mars' supposed 'life-rich' history.

title: Donald Trump Defies Exit Poll Predictions, Takes Lead Over Kamala Harris
content: Americans on Tuesday voted to decide whether Kamala Harris will win the race to the White House or Donald Trump will retain the top post for a second time.
summary: Americans on Tuesday voted to decide whether Kamala Harris will win the race to the White House or Donald Trump will retain the top post for a second time.

title: "Bibi Traitor": Protests In Tel Aviv After Netanyahu Fires Defence Minister
content: Thousands of Israelis rallied in Tel Aviv late Tuesday to protest the sacking of defence minister Yoav Gallant, calling on his successor Israel Katz to prioritise a hostage deal to return the captives still held in Gaza.
summary: Thousands of Israelis rallied in Tel Aviv late Tuesday to protest the sacking of defence minister Yoav Gallant, calling on his successor Israel Katz to prioritise a hostage deal to return the captives still held in Gaza.

title: Donald Trump Ahead, Harris Close Behind, Republican Lead In Swing States
content: Counting has begun for the US elections and Donald Trump has been announced the winner in the Red states of Indiana and Kentucky and Kamala Harris in the Blue state of Vermont by American networks.
summary: Counting has begun for the US elections and Donald Trump has been announced the winner in the Red states of Indiana and Kentucky and Kamala Harris in the Blue state of Vermont by American networks.

title: Who Is Israel Katz, The New Israeli Defence Minister?
content: Israel Katz, formerly Israel's foreign minister, has been appointed defence minister after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu sacked Yoav Gallant from the post.
summary: Israel Katz, formerly Israel's foreign minister, has been appointed defence minister after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu sacked Yoav Gallant from the post.

title: Trump Alleges "Massive Cheating" In Key Swing State Of Pennsylvania
content: Donald Trump sought to undermine Tuesday the credibility of voting in the biggest city of must-win Pennsylvania, a soundly Democratic area that was part of the ex-president's unsupported 2020 fraud claims.
summary: Donald Trump sought to undermine Tuesday the credibility of voting in the biggest city of must-win Pennsylvania, a soundly Democratic area that was part of the ex-president's unsupported 2020 fraud claims.

title: Over 70% Of Voters Not Happy With How Things Are Going In US: Exit Polls
content: The state of democracy, the shape of the economy and abortion are the most important issues for American voters in the US presidential election, according to the first wave of exit polls.
summary: The state of democracy, the shape of the economy and abortion are the most important issues for American voters in the US presidential election, according to the first wave of exit polls.
